India is making significant progress in developing Multimodal Logistics Parks (MMLP)
to strengthen its transport and logistics infrastructure. These parks are being strategically developed in key locations
such as Chennai, Bengaluru, and Nagpur, under the government's Bharatmala Pariyojana initiative, aimed at improving logistics efficiency across the country.


MMLPs are designed as large cargo handling facilities
, covering at least 100 acres
and equipped withâ€¦ See more

In 2025, the International Maritime Organization (IMO) plans to take further critical steps in the fight against COâ‚‚ emissions in maritime shipping. 
 A significant event will be the introduction of a global carbon pricing mechanism for greenhouse gas emissions, set to be approved in 2025. This will alter operational costs for shipping companies, as vessels will be required to pay for their COâ‚‚ emissions, providing an additional incentive to invest in zero-emission fuels.
